outputs.output_descr:
1. An increased awareness of early learning & disability challenges in Kuwait with a special emphasis on awareness of learning disabilities
2.Development of nationally standardized tols for the identification of Arabic speaking Kuwaiti individuals including areas of general cognitive ability, scholastic achievement and psycho-educational diagnostic indicators to enhance early identification initiatives of at-risk individuals
3. Development of nationally standardized intervention and remedial programmes in Arabic to overcome literacy and numberacy deficits of Kuwaiti persons with disability
4. Upgraded and strengthened national technical and institutional capacity of existing training programmes working in the field of early learning and disability challenges
